SurveyMapping
RegisterSurvey

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the hash value of a specific survey, by ID
@param _surveyId The survey ID
nodes.name: ReturnHash

devdoc.details: Basic implementation of a mapping-styled smart contract to keep track of surveys against their outputed hash values The implementation has 2 basic methods - RegisterSurvey, ReturnHash - and it also implements Ownable.sol

RegisterSurvey(string,string).details: Adds new hash value entry to survey ID mapping

params._hash: The hash output of the survey
params._surveyId: The survey ID     * A typical survey ID might be something like: SV_9soLp9xtDjAKP53

ReturnHash(string).details: Returns the hash value of a specific survey, by ID

devdoc.title: Survey Mapping
